description: I am a man who has an interest in programming.  My specialization includes quickly learning new skills and programming languages, problem solving, framework and design patterns.  so far the skills that I already have include Flutter, Javascript, Nuxt JS, Laravel, PHP, Postgresql, MySql, React Native.  I started studying Golang and React JS.  I am still enthusiastic about reaching a new programming language, framework, design pattern, and everything about programming
